inn1.comm: just short of length with some away movement well outside off, Rohit chops it to point
on good length outside off, some outswing again and Rohit leaves this time
on the stumps now at 134kph, Rohit flicks it tentatively in the air and it falls well short of midwicket
tough further towards leg stump and Rohit flicks it much better this time, and there's a deep midwicket to keep it to one
little back of length around off stump, Dhawan stays back and defends close to himself
bit too full outside off, Dhawan drives beautifully through the covers and the mid-off fielder dives to his right to save three
starts on the pads, Dhawan tucks it easily to the midwicket region for one
good bounce for that one at 140kph, Rohit came forward a bit and defended the back of length ball outside off
on the stumps now and Rohit flicks it away in the air over midwicket. There's no deep midwicket this time and Rohit has connected enough to send it for four
short of length outside off, Rohit pokes at it away from the body to help it to third man
short of length around off, Dhawan stays back and gets a thick edge to third man for one
short ball goes towards the leg side, Rohit got into a position to hook but didn't go ahead with the shot and it goes just over him. Not called a wide
touch short of length around off, Dhawan helps it into the covers
shorter and closer to off, Dhawan doesn't move his feet at all and swings and misses
width on the off side and Dhawan slams it through the covers for mid-off to keep it to one again
short fine leg is in, he gets a short ball and pulls it fine on the leg side for four pretty easily
again, and that's just over short fine leg now, Rabada fielder there. Rohit pulled the short ball again, didn't get enough height and Rabada jumped but it just escaped him
right on the off stump now, Rohit defends it back with a straight bat
little bit of width on the off side and Dhawan guides it late to third man for one

back of length on off again, Rohit defended it late to beat backward point and wanted one straightaway. Dhawan wanted to wait and watch if backward point got a hand to it or not and they eventually go for the single
short ball towards the ribs, Dhawan pulls it awkwardly to square leg. Oh, the fielder gets a direct hit and they get one more
another short ball, another pull, another four from Rohit! This time he makes sure it's far from short fine leg and sent it flying, to the fielder's left
back of length towards middle and leg, he defends on the leg side
143.4kph, short again and now Rohit goes on his toes to tuck it along the ground behind square on leg and keeps strike
back of length outside off, Rohit defends with soft hands into the covers and says no. Dhawan wanted one but was sent back
touch fuller and Rohit drives it nicely into the covers, straight to the fielder
back of length, bit of width outside off and he slices it late to third man for one
bit full around off, Dhawan pushes it down towards mid-off and AB has a shy at the stumps, misses and Dhawan makes it
flicked uppishly again and this time he's given a catch to midwicket! It was angling in towards the pads, Rohit flicked and found du Plessis, who tumbled to his right for a low catch
how well he plays that flick! The ball was headed for the stumps and Kohli tucked it off the pads towards long leg to get off the mark
short ball to welcome Kohli, he stays back and hops to keep the ball down with a defence
drifts towards the pads, Kohli glances fine and it goes straight to short fine leg

another mix up wasn't far away - Kohli drove the ball straight down the ground, Rabada got a leg to it and the ball popped up which made Kohli call for one, but Dhawan didn't want the one. Kohli also goes back by the time mid-off goes straight and stops it
comes forward a bit and defends the ball into the covers

Kohli gets a glove and that went just wide of a diving QdK who ran to his left! The short ball put Kohli in an awkward position, he went ahead with the pull and got a glove which sent the ball in the air, QdK tried his best but was just wide
back of length outside off, Dhawan cuts and finds point
length delivery towards off stump, Kohli defends it back
touch wider outside off, Kohli takes a tiny step forward and pushes into the covers
back of length with some width, he defends it late to find one wide of backward point
around the off stump from back of length, Dhawan defends off the back foot
length delivery around the off stump, he defends into the covers
touch fuller on the off stump, Dhawan gets a chance to drive this time but finds cover
141.7kph, bit of inswing towards the off stump, Kohli defends it solidly with a short forward stride
just wide of point! Kohli slashed at the widish delivery outside off, sent it in the air and Miller dived to his left at point but it was just wide
pulls the short ball fine, and Morris gets to the ball in no time to stop it with his right hand
some width outside off again, he cuts it wide of point for one this time
goes short and wide on the off side, called a wide

so many catches flying around and now QdK has taken a stunner! Finally Rabada's short ball gets him a wicket - it was on the leg side and Dhawan pulled awkwardly and got the ball to pop up fine on the leg side. QdK took two steps before flying to his right and took it with only one hand!
length delivery on the off side and Rahane defends it back
back of length around the off stump, Kohli tucks it to the leg side
bit of inswing towards the off stump, Kohli covers his stumps and defends it back solidly
some room on the off side now, Kohli punches it to extra cover
slower ball at 121kph, it was short of length and cutting in, Kohli waited and defended to the leg side for a single
brings it in with the angle towards the off stump, Rahane defends with hard hands and gets a thick edge towards point
angled down the leg side now, Rahane shoulders his arms early enough to let it go
angles a short ball in, Rahane tucks it off his pads towards square leg to get off the mark
bit of room with the scrambled seam on the off side, Rahane pushes it into the covers for one
short of length around off again, Kohli stays back and punches it on the off side
back of length again, Kohli stays back and turns it towards deep square leg for one
just a little bit of width on off and Rahane cuts it late to third man
hint of outswing outside off and Kohli also guides it to third man for one
shortish on the off side and Rahane swats it to the leg side between mid-on and midwicket for one. Didn't get the middle of the bat though
starts with a low full toss on the stumps, driven down to long-on for one
fullish on off stump, driven into the covers and AB dives to his right to save one, the crowd loves it!
around off again and he pushes with soft hands this time for a quick one
full and outside leg, sweeps it fine and straight to short fine leg
full on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on for one
back of length towards the stumps, helped to the leg side for one
short ball, Rahane pulls and gets hardly any bat on that, just a bit of bottom edge and the ball lands on the pitch. Maybe beaten by pace a little bit
outside off now and Rahane is happy to guide to third man for one
some width outside off again, Kohli also taps it to third man for one
short ball is pulled behind square and it falls wide and short of Morris at fine leg
goes back towards off and tucks the ball from outside off to midwicket for one
flighted towards the leg stump, Kohli comes down and drives it to long on
pushes the fullish delivery on off into the covers with soft hands for one
how well that was timed! Kohli comes down the ground to take the ball on the full, punches it down and in the air and checks the follow through, and it goes all the way for six over long off!
some turn now around off as Kohli closes the face of the bat to leg and gets an outside edge to point
drives this delivery down the ground for one
towards middle and leg now and it's helped to deep midwicket for one
there's width, it was shortish too and Rahane flayed it on the off side between cover point and backward point for four! Beautifully timed to find the gap
shorter and closer to the off stump, taps it to third man easily
back of length outside off, Kohli stays back and punches it authoritatively wide of cover point for a powerful four. What a shot!
touch back of length outside off, he defends with soft hands towards point for a quick single and they steal one
short ball with good bounce towards Rahane's head, he pulls it easily to fine leg for one
139.3kph, back of length just outside off, now Kohli taps it to third man for one
full and outside off, he drives it nicely towards deep cover in the gap and gets two
fullish on the leg stump now and it's tucked to square leg for one
full around off and driven straight to cover
goes back in the crease, looking to work it to leg but the ball straightens and takes a thick outside edge
bit too short now and Rahane cuts it off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
towards middle and leg and Kohli tucks it to square leg for one
92.5kph, flattish around off, and it's pushed into the covers
keeps a touch low with turn outside off and it's sliced to cover point
looks for a single by pushing the ball into the covers but there's no time
much straighter  and flatter, and Kohli defends it back
long hop, it's a googly and Kohli rocks back to unleash a pull and he clears deep midwicket! Replays show the ball landed right on the boundary rope, just wide a of a diving Phangiso so it's a six
good length now around middle and it's pushed down to long on for one
on length on the middle stump, Kohli puts his front foot forward and turns it to long on
flighted and full outside off, driven nicely to deep cover for one
shorter and wider outside off, Kohli goes on the back foot but finds the bottom of the edge while slamming it thought the covers but gets one
good turn towards middle from leg, gets Rahane's outside edge towards point
bit too full outside off and it's driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
flatter delivery with some turn, Kohli went back to help it to leg but the ball came slower than he expected and ended up defending it
flighted and full on off, flicked to deep midwicket for one
outside off with turn, Kohli lets it turn and then helped it with a late touch to the third man boundary for four
fuller outside off, driven down to log off for one
googly turning in from outside off, Rahane defends off the front foot and stops the ball as it's rolling towards the stumps
googly towards leg stump now and Rahane helps it along behind square leg for one
flighted and full on leg, Kohli finds midwicket and says no for the single
presses forward and defends the length ball into the covers
bit of flight outside off, Rahane lets it turn and cuts off the back foot to deep point for two
another front-foot defence from Rahane for the length delivery
straight-bat defence now off the front foot on the off side
just a bit on middle and leg, Rahane sweeps against the turn and finds short fine leg
bit too full on middle stump and it's turned down to long on for one, and that's India's 100
a dibbly-dobbly outside off and it's driven to cover
back of length just outside off, worked down to long on for one
too wide outside off, Kohli frees his arms with a big swing and a misfield from Amla at backward point gets them two
just a bit of room now, Kohli helps the ball late to short third man and Rahane responds well for one
bit of mix up as Rahane gets an bottom edge while driving the ball and it goes over Behardien, Rahane comes out of the crease, Kohli says no as AB dives at mid off and throws it back in no time
almost in the block hole outside off and it's helped to backward point

he reaches fifty with a single - pushed the ball down the ground to mid-off and took off immediately. He put in the dive too but there was no direct hit. Celebrates rather aggressively by punching his chest with his left hand and raises his bat
angling in towards the pads and it's flicked in the air to fine leg
bit of width outside off, Kohli chops it late and wide of deep third man for one
shuffles a bit towards off stump for the ball on leg, and he flicks it dangerously very fine on the leg side for four as Morris grimaces
on the other side now - got some width outside off and Rahane played at it away from the body to help it fine and beats a diving Steyn at third man
delivers from wide of the crease now to get some angle and Rahane defends it on off
pretty straight and it's flicked down to long on for one
touch back of length outside off and Rahane helps it to short third man, sent back by Kohli for the single
errs towards the pads and it's worked off the legs to fine leg
short of length legcutter around middle and off and it's tucked to the leg side in the gap and Kohli calls for two
towards the pads again and it's flicked through midwicket for another single
attempts a yorker and the full toss on leg is flicked to deep square leg
length delivery on the off stump, pushed down to mid on
full and outside off, and what a handsome drive from Rahane! Puts his front foot forward, big back lift, gets on top of the ball and creams it through the covers even though there wasn't much room
errs down the leg side for a wide
angling in towards off, driven down to mid on now
touch short of length outside off, he plays it late and delicately to help it fine on the off side
just around the off stump and Kohli stops it with a defence
fullish outside off and driven nicely to sweeper cover, seven from that over
yes, it's a short ball towards leg stump, Kohli pulls it late while moving towards off and gets it fine before Tahir cuts it in
shortish outside off now, and he helps it off the back foot to third man for one
some room outside off, Rahane pokes his bat out and sends it to third man
fullish outside off, Kohli defends it back with a straight bat
back of length towards off, Kohli goes across a bit to defend it to leg and calls for one. But it's not far from Rabada's right and Rahane says no
bangs it in at 144.4kph, Kohli pulls it nicely to deep midwicket for one
comes down the track and helps the ball from off to midwicket and goes back in the crease
beaten outside off! This one didn't nip in from outside off, maybe Kohli expected it and didn't move his feet. Only poked and missed
angled towards middle and leg now, worked off the pads for one
strolls down and drives the ball through the covers for one, and that's the 100 partnership
short ball outside off, Kohli leaves and it's called a wide
fullish now outside off and it's pushed down to mid off
on length on middle and leg, it's helped to midwicket
well outside off now and it's driven to sweeper cover for one
walks down the track and drives the fullish ball to long on
bit too full on middle and leg again, driven down to long on again
on middle stump now and Kohli defends it back
beaten with turn outside off and Kohli sticks his bat out but the ball turns away past the edge

and the change works - Steyn has got him caught behind! There was some room, Rahane went for the shot without moving his feet much and the ball stayed a tad low to take the bottom edge and QdK took it with both hands, Steyn is pumped after a long time
length delivery outside off, Raina defends in the covers
he's off the mark, what a relief for him, as he taps the ball from outside off to third man for one

oh, nearly a mix up and close to a run out! Kohli pushed the ball into the covers and called for one straightaway but Raina responded a little late, Behardien threw the ball to the keeper's but Raina made it as it wasn't a direct hit
short ball now around off and Raina tucks it to leg for one
some outswing outside off, Kohli drives it nicely off the front foot through the covers and Tahir cuts it in but they take two
turning in from off, helped with the turn to leg for one
falls short as Kohli pushes the flat delivery uppishly back to Tahir, but it doesn't carry
drives the ball square with the turn and his top hand comes off, but they take two
turning away from outside off and he taps it late to short third man
turning in from well outside off, Raina presses forward to take it on the pad for a stifled appeal but it struck him outside off
back of length outside off, slapped down to mid off
moves towards the ball outside off and pushes it to point
just back of length outside off, Kohli punches on off but gets a bottom edge
low full toss and it's merely pushed down the ground by Kohli, but such is the timing that it beats mid on
outside off, Kohli cuts as he ges some room and there's a misfield at backward point to give them two
towards the pads now and Kohli flicks it nicely to fine leg for one
fullish on middle and leg, pushes it down easily to long on
turns it in a little bit, Raina defends to the leg side
much fuller now and it's driven down to long on for one
flat outside off and Kohli cuts it wide of short third man for two more
fullish on off and it's turned straight to midwicket
towards off and middle, pushed down to long on and he keeps strike
length delivery outside off, Kohli defends tentatively and gets a thick outside edge for one
angling across outside off, pushed into the covers for one
on good length close to off, Kohli covers his stumps and defends it back
full and swinging in towards off and middle, flicked away to deep midwicket for one
short ball, Raina didn't look good while pulling it but manages to go off strike with a single to deep backward square leg

doesn't middle the drive down the ground but takes off for the single, takes on AB at mid-off and dives again to make it in as AB misses the direct hit. He has been stealing singles consistenly in this sapping heat
full on middle, pushed down to long on for one
googly well outside off, Raina lets it turn away and helps it to short third man and Kohli responds for the quick single
bit slower on the off stump, Kohli presses forward and defends to backward point
sweeps against the turn from leg, gets some pad and there was a slight mix up after both batsmen took a couple of steps and eventually managed one
defends the turning length ball to midwicket
fullish around off, Raina drives it uppishly and just clears a diving cover fielder, wasn't too far from him
starts off with a wide outside off as Raina swings and misses
towards the pads and it's tucked behind square on leg
back of length around off, pushed down to long on for one
fullish outside off now, driven with the angle to long off for one more
short ball outside off, Kohli waits and pulls with some power but doesn't time it properly. Still gets one past midwicket
pretty full on the stumps and it's worked to long on
fullish around off, rolls his wrists over this one to send it to long on for one
full on middle stump, worked down the ground to long on
flighted well outside off, driven off the front foot to sweeper cover for one
pretty full on off, pushed down to mid off
some turn outside off, Kohli waits and helps it to short third man
the flight gives Kohli time and he hammers that down the ground with a big follow through, was in the air fleetingly as it went past Tahir, for four

tucks this one to midwicket and he wants a quick single, very risky run and luckily for him it wasn't a direct hit at the non-striker's end so he makes it. Du Plessis had put in a dive to his left from midwicket and if he had hit, Kohli was way outside
way down the leg side, Kohli pulls and misses and it's a wide
short ball angled nicely towards Kohli now, he gets into an awkward position on the back foot and the ball lobs in the air off the top edge but falls short of Rabada
in the air again, Kohli pulls the short ball and it falls well short of deep midwicket who's running in
short ball on the leg side, Raina ducked almost as soon as the ball was delivered
well down the leg side now, not a short ball and Raina leaves for another wide
tries a yorker and the low full toss on leg is helped to midwicket
high and handsome! Pitched up to Raina on the stumps, he clears his front foot a bit and lofts it absolutely straight down the ground for a one-bounce four, landed just inside
he's expecting the short ball, goes in the crease and shuffles to middle to tuck the back of length ball to leg for one
fullish on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket for one
comes down for the leg side slog, doesn't get enough and it rolls away to the leg side
fullish on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
length delivery around off, pushed into the covers now
touch shorter and wider, cuts off the back foot to point
some turn from middle towards off, Kohli defends with a thick outside edge
lot of width outside off, Raina swings and misses
short ball towards Raina's head, he pulls somehow in the air but it falls safe near backward square leg
shuffles a bit towards off to tuck it past a diving midwicket for one, they thought of the second too
on length on the off stump, he defends it back
full again to Raina and he lofts it straight down the ground, hardly had to move his feet and sent it easily  to long-on, where Rayudu takes the catch beyond the boundary
goes on the back foot to defend the ball to leg now
shortish around off, bit of turn and Kohli pulls off the back foot and finds midwicket

charges down the ground and sends it hight, just over a jumping long-on to reach his hundred, the crowd erupts! Kohli flaunts his biceps one by one to the dressing room and takes a helmet full of sweat off his head. Gets a hug from Raina
pushes the fullish delivery down to long off now
sends this one down leg for a wide now
length delivery on off, tucked to midwicket now
helps it with the turn to deep backward square for one
flattish on the stumps and he defends it to leg
another shot goes just over a fielder - Raina swats this back of length ball just over backward square leg for two
angling in and a full ball, Raina drives it straight down the ground with a straight bat and drills it for four
slightly outside off now and it's driven through the covers for one
takes a stance well outside leg, the ball follows him and he helps it to fine leg for one
back of length around the off stump, tucked to the leg side
bangs in the short ball outside off, Raina taps it in the air towards third man
comes down the track, it's a full toss down leg and Rains finds short fine leg
comes down again and pushes the ball down the ground for one
Kohli gives the charge for the fullish delivery, lofts it down and it bounces well before Steyn at long on
makes room now, Phangiso bowls on middle and it's pushed to long off
just a bit of width, Kohli goes on the back foot and slices it with such timing that it bisects backward point and short third man for four
dances down to take it on the full and hammers that absolutely straight down the ground over the umpire for a one-bounce four

makes room to drive the ball inside out and the ball lands in the gap behind square on the off side. They take two, and then Kohli, who must be tired in these conditions, pushes Raina for the third as Amla sends a wayward throw
Kohli's stance is well outside leg and pretty open, Morris bowls at his toes and he gets some bat as the ball goes between his legs
full toss towards the waist, pushed down to long on
full toss to Kohli too, flicked to deep midwicket for one
that's way down the leg side for a wide
fullish outside off, pushed down easily to long off
tries a yorker and Kohli helps the low full toss to long on now. He looks tired now, just walking around for the singles
towards the pads and it's flicked to deep midwicket
flat on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
the flighted full toss is helped to long on for one

charges down and Kohli sends that flying over midwicket in the gap! Looked like a googly so Kohli went with the turn and the umpires are checking if it's four or six. It's landed on the rope, so six it is
flatter and shorter around off, Kohli paddles it with a premeditated shot fine on leg
sharp turn into the batsman, Raina presses forward and defends
just outside off, pretty full, and Kohli swings and misses
back of length now and it's slapped back down the ground, long-on runs to his left to keep it in
he makes room for the straight delivery and swats it straight back close to the non-striker and he gets enough on that to get four
it's the short ball and Raina defends it awkwardly to square leg
towards the pads and it's tucked to the leg side for one
bouncer to Kohli and he pulls it to deep midwicket to keep strike
comes down the track, Tahir pitches it wide outside off and Kohli rolls his wrists over this one to long on

Raina goes for the slog, maybe it was a googly and the top edge went very high, but in no man's land down the ground. Tahir runs backwards, AB runs from midwicket towards mid-off but it goes through his hands
bit of flight on middle and leg, helped to midwicket
touch wider outside off, he cuts to point for one
short and flat, swatted down the ground to long on
flat on off stump, pushed down to long on and that's Raina's fifty. He needed that more than anyone else after two consecutive ducks
145kph, wants to heave on the leg side but it's a short and wide delivery on off, he swings and misses
makes room this time for the short delivery on the stumps, sends it flying and it falls well short of deep cover
back of length outside off, flays on the off side for one
the pull sends the ball in the air, Phangiso dives to his right with a full stretch and gets both his hands to the ball but can't hold on to it and then dives again to keep the ball in
Raina makes room, Steyn sends it wide outside off and it's called a wide. Steyn is unhappy with that
back of length, pulled straight to midwicket for an easy catch! A crucial fifty from Raina comes to an end because of Steyn with a shortish ball
he gets a short ball first ball and pulls it off the middle, and sends it wide of fine leg for four. The crowd is going mad
flattish delivery on middle stump, Kohli tries a paddle sweep and takes the ball on the left shoulder
he goes the conventional way with a stride down the ground and lofts that straight down, absolutely creamed it for six
now slog sweep against the turn to deep midwicket for one
takes a step down and pushes the ball back to Tahir
flighted and low full toss outside off, driven down the ground to long off
high full toss on leg and Kohli pulls to deep midwicket, he's cramping up badly and it's called no ball for height
tries a big shot down the ground, doesn't middle it and it falls not too far from long off, they settle for one
back of length and angling in, helped to the leg side for one
makes room and drives the length delivery to deep cover
charges down for a heave and misses it completely
that's pretty wide down the leg side now
back of length and pulled, he doesn't middle it and finds midwicket
goes deep in the crease towards off and pulls the back of length ball from off to midwicket
he looks to pull by making room, the short ball follows him and goes over him as he goes down on a knee, that's a legitimate delivery
back of length outside off, he wants to hammer it but doesn't time it to perfection and finds deep midwicket
makes room and flicks the fullish delivery to leg, they take one and Kohli has to duck under the ball while keeping his bat in at the non-striker's end
outside off and punched to deep cover for one now
full delivery outside off, driven through the covers now for one
back of length outside off with room, Dhoni goes hard at it and it goes high on the off side, falls short of deep cover as Morris runs in
a bouncer to end the over and Kohli sways out of the line
full and angling in, Dhoni opens up and heaves, doesn't connect and takes it on the back leg for a leg bye
that's the end of Kohli, he's caught behind for 138! Shortish ball going down leg and he pulled, got a faint edge and QdK took it easily

oh Harbhajan is bowled down the leg side! He wanted to tuck the ball to leg with the angle, and the ball deflected off his pads to the stumps. The umpires are checking for a no ball, and Rabada has overstepped here, nothing behind the line when his heel lands. Oh, hello! He's still been given out. Can't figure out the reason why that's not a no ball and the TV commentators are confused too
back of length outside off, there's room and Axar cuts off the back foot wide of third man for two
angling in to Axar, chips it down the ground to long on
Dhoni opens up for the back of length ball and clips to leg for one
Dhoni connects this time with a slog but there's a fielder at deep midwicket for one
back of length outside off with the angle, Axar swings and misses
much wider outside off, Axar flays the ball to sweeper cover

full delivery is driven down the ground to long on, they are strangely coming back for the second because the ball went straight to long. But Steyn doesn't collect the ball at bowler's end and they actually get two
makes room for the short ball, flays it down the ground and finds mid off. Excellent over this is from Steyn
a wicket to end the innings too! Bhuvi hardly got any bat on the short ball on off stump, Steyn collected the ball and ran him out at the non-striker's end

inn2.comm: swings it into the batsman but down the leg side for a wide
gives some width outside off and QdK drives into the covers
back of length and swinging in, pushed to the leg side
touch fuller outside off and he drives it nicely in the gap through the covers for two
back of length outside off, there's room too and QdK square drives it in the gap between point and cover point for four
another wide down the leg side in the first over
some room outside off again, he punches it down to mid off
back of length outside off and he defends it back to the bowler
nice outswing outside off, Amla runs it down to third man for one
angles it into the pads and QdK tucks it away nicely towards deep square leg before Harbhajan cuts it in
full outside off, driven hard and straight to Dhawan at cover
fullish outside off again, he drives it into the covers now with another high follow through
back of length outside off, punched down to mid-off and that's a no ball for overstepping
there's some room outside off, QdK goes hard at it and flays it through the off side and in the air for a cracking four
fullish outside off and it's pushed down to mid off now
well outside the off stump and Amla lets it go
coming in slightly towards Amla from back of length, Amla drives it late to third man

nearly missed three dismissals on one ball - QdK first chipped the back of length ball over Amla, and the two batsmen had a little mix up by the time Rohit at mid on dived to stop it. He missed a direct hit at bowler's end and the ball missed at the keeper's end too, where Amla dragged his bat in
Amla's bat comes down late for the incoming delivery and the edge goes near the stumps, and behind square on the leg side
length delivery outside off, driven into the covers
much straighter on the off stump and he defends it back
touch short of length outside off, pushed in the covers by Amla
fuller on the off side, driven down the ground to mid on and he didn't time it too well
angling in and Amla tucks it to midwicket for a quick single as Dhawan dives to save it
some room on the off side, QdK drives and finds covers point
bangs in the bouncer towards QdK as he ducks under it
angled towards middle stump now, QdK pushes it just wide of mid on for a quick single
he gets room on the off side and unleashes a beautiful square drive to pierce the gap between cover point and cover for a four
that's a no ball for overstepping and QdK flicks the incoming delivery over the in field on the leg side for four more
it's a free hit so QdK pulls the short ball over square leg for two more
towards the pads now and it's tucked to square leg off the legs
better line - on the off stump now and QdK clips it just wide of midwicket for one
not much room outside off, on length and Amla doesn't move his feet and defends to point
around the off stump on back of length and Amla clips it to the leg side off the back foot, a little tumble in the deep gives them three and 15 from the over
pulled to the leg side and straight to midwicket, the crowd has come alive! It was short around off, Amla got into position nicely to pull and Dhawan had to jump just a bit to catch with both hands
welcomes him with the bouncer and Faf hardly has to move to leave it, called a wide
back of length outside off, drives it into the covers
punched down towards mid-off past Mohit and they decide against the single with a fielder there
short of length outside off again, punched to cover point
taps the ball late towards backward point where Axar stops it with his left hand but there's enough time for a run
walks across the stumps a little and Mohit angles it in, QdK clips it fine on the leg side and gets four more. It's his fifth four in six overs
punches the back of length ball from outside off back to the bowler who gets a hand to it
touch fuller and closer to the stumps, Faf defends it on the off side
bouncer on the off side and Faf lets it go, called a wide for height
defends the straighter delivery back down the ground towards mid off
pretty full outside off and it's driven straight to cover
a bouncer again outside off and Faf lets this one go too
just around the off stump and it's punched to mid off for a quick single
the top edge goes high and right over the keeper's head for four! Short ball coming in and Faf pulled, the edge flew high and back in no man's land
short ball on the off side, Faf taps it wide of backward point for one
first goes towards off and then makes some room to cut it firmly to backward point
slower ball is an offcutter on back of length, QdK whips it by pivoting on the back foot and gets four more
goes for a big swing on the leg side for the length delivery outside off, swings and misses this time
bit too full this time around off and QdK punches it down the ground past mid off. Rohit chases and puts in a dive to cut it in and keep it to two
138kph, back of length around off, pushed down the ground to mid off
angles it in towards the off stump, Faf defends on the off side
138.6kph, bouncer towards the stumps and Faf lets it go
comes down the track and slaps the length delivery to mid off for a quick single
a bouncer to QdK too, from around the wicket and he leaves it alone too
from wide of the crease and angling in, QdK sees the short ball and pulls it away using the pace of the ball to the square-leg boundary for six!
turns it into the batsman, Faf looks to defend it to leg and the ball lobs off the waist before Dhoni catches it. The stadium appeals and umpire Ravi doesn't move
comes down a step and clips the ball to leg
pushes the ball to off and gets a thick edge onto the front pad
comes out of the crease again to take it on the full and drives wide of midwicket for one
bit of flight outside off and QdK defends it back
good turn outside the off stump, QdK waited for it to turn away but it did too much and went out of his reach
swing and a miss first ball as Faf drives outside off a hint of turn beats him
comes on the front foot now and defends the ball back
the turn surprises Faf a little as he comes down to push it back and the ball takes the outside edge to point
comes down the track now and drives to long off for one
takes a step down and clips the ball to leg for one
some turn outside off as QdK pushes away from the body and gets a thick outside edge
pretty full and flighted around off, driven down to long on for one
Harbhajan was on the prowl and Jinxy the Cat takes it at second slip! Nicely tossed up outside off, QdK is tempted for the drive and he goes for it too, edging the ball to slips
nice flight towards middle and leg, pushed to the leg side with the turn and he's off the mark
tossed up around off again, Faf waits and defends it back
takes a step down and takes it on the full to clip it to midwicket
sharp turn outside off from back of length, AB made room and cut it off the back foot
touch fuller and Faf cuts it too towards sweeper cover
full on off and it's pushed back to the bowler
marginally shorter and AB drives it back, but can't connect well
right on the stumps this time and AB blocks it back
comes down and across to cover the stumps, and clips it to long on for one
negates the turn by coming down and drives to long on easily
sharp turn from outside off, there was bounce too and Faf was beaten! He waited on the back foot, the ball came in and struck him on the waist as the crowd "ooohs"
comes down the track this time and clips to long on for one
pretty slow through the air with turn, AB presses forward and takes it on the pad
charges down to take it on the full and AB slams it back and that hits Faf straight on the right elbow as he turned back to get away from the ball
comes down the track again and pushes the ball wide of Faf to long on for one
back of length outside off and AB cuts it fiercely to sweeper cover for one
around off stump and Faf paddles it fine and high on the leg side and he hares back for the second
goes back this time to tuck the ball with the angle to deep square leg for two more

big appeal and the finger goes up! Faf barely moved his feet for the length delivery outside off, it turned away sharply as Faf poked his bat and Dhoni went up as soon as he pouched it. Faf shows his displeasure by raising his right arm and says something too. Replays show there was some noise when the ball went past the bat, Snicko also shows there was something
puts his front foot forward outside leg and the ball turns away further, takes it on the pad
covers the stumps and defends the ball back to Axar
turning in from off, AB clips it with the turn behind square on leg
Miller tries to sweep the ball against the turn from around off and doesn't get anywhere close to the ball
defends the flighted length delivery from on off with soft hands
more towards middle now and he sweeps to get off the mark
takes a step down and AB slams it back again, not too far from Miller and they take two by the time Rayudu slides at long on
that's the doosra as the ball pitches outside off and straightens as AB is beaten, as Harbhajan appeals even though it hit him outside off
turning in a bit and it's helped to backward square leg with the turn
takes a couple of steps down and AB takes it on the pad in front of middle and leg way outside the crease. Dhoni appeals for that too and umpire says no
goes for the sweep against the turn and gets a bottom edge onto the pads
full outside off and it's pushed back to the bowler
angling in towards middle and leg, AB is cramped up for room and defends it to leg just in time
two slips in place and Miller tries to reverse sweep dangerously, and misses
takes a tiny step forward now and defends it back
just outside off and he pushes it into the covers. He wants one, maybe wants to go off strike, and is sent back by AB
nobody in the deep and Miller connects this time as it's slightly overpitched and he sweeps it, down on one knee to the midwicket boundary
beautiful delivery tossed up outside off with flight and turn and he lets it go

oh, that's the other one, it doesn't turn but goes the other way after pitching on off and hit him right in front of middle stump on the front foot. The players appeal, the crowd appeals and Ravi's finger goes up
AB comes down again and pushes the ball down to long off for one
defends the fullish delivery back to the bowler
touch wider outside off and it's driven to cover now
clipped down to mid-on and AB is sent back for the single. He's back just in time and there's no direct hit
turning away a bit from outside off, driven with the turn through the covers for one
this one slides in and AB defends it in front of the stumps to the off side
comes down the track and clips it with the turn to leg for one
turning in towards AB and he plays it with the turn behind square on leg
tossed up around off and middle, flicked to the leg side
takes a step down and helps the ball to midwicket
comes down again for the flighted delivery and drives down to long on for one
slower through the air and turning in, he goes back and defends it to leg for a quick single
pretty flat outside off and it's pushed off the back foot to long off
fullish outside off, he defends it back
comes out of the crease, Axar pitches it short and flat and AB does well to defend it from well outside off
there's some turn outside off and thick edge flies away from first slip to the third man boundary before Mishra chases and slides to keep it in
edged again and this one wasn't far from Raina at first slip! Behardien drove outside off, got an edge and the ball flew between Dhoni and Raina in no time
pretty flight outside off and he pushes and misses
just outside off, he lets it turn and cuts it nicely in the gap behind backward point for three
beats him outside off as Behardien pushes and misses
towards middle and leg and it's clipped to the leg side for one
AB comes down to negate the spin outside off and blocks it
beats AB too, to end the over as he goes in the crease to defend and the ball turns away
slides it towards the off stump, Behardien pushes it down to long off
bit too short outside off, AB rocks back to slam it through the covers and the cover fielder gets a hand to it
comes down the track and offers his pad
cuts through the covers again and gets one this time
goes for a slog on the leg side against the turn and misses
length delivery on the off stump with some turn and Behardien gets a thick outside edge
bit of flight and AB sweeps it against the turn to the midwicket boundary. There's nobody there and he gets four
flighted around middle and off and it's paddle-swept towards fine leg for one
the googly comes in as the batsman goes on the back foot and gets one to the leg side
bit of flight outside off, there's turn too and it's chipped in the air through the covers for one
flatter outside off, pushed down to long off easily
towards middle stump now and AB paddles it again to the fine leg region for one
length delivery on off and it's driven down to long off
even fuller outside off and he pushes it down to long off again
AB goes for a wild swing now to the leg side and misses
length delivery outside off, driven to cover
towards the off stump now and it's pushed back to the bowler
he goes down on a knee, and sweeps the ball off the middle of the bat to the backward square leg boundary for a four
tossed up outside off, pushed down to long off easily
comes down to take it as a low full toss and whips it with his wrists past mid on and wide of deep midwicket too to get four more. Excellent placement
teasing line and length outside off, it doesn't turn that much beats him
oh, what a miss! AB came down and missed the ball, it turned past Dhoni too and Raina had a shy at the stumps but missed it
goes back to pull and mistimes it, falls just short of midwicket
takes a step down and drives it to long off to get a single
swinging in a bit towards off stump and AB defends on the off side
towards the middle stump now and it's clipped away past midwicket in the gap for two
fullish and well outside off, AB taps it to point
stays a bit low as AB stays back and punches it to sweeper cover
length delivery around the off stump, Behardien drives it to cover
enough room this time outside off and FB taps it to third man for one
nicely flighted on the off stump, Behardien blocks it back to the bowler
flighted a touch wider outside off now, FB drives and misses, beaten by the turn and MSD even takes the bails off
goes towards off a little and pushes the ball down to long off for one
AB tries the sweep against the turn but misses and takes it somewhere close to his face because of the bounce
shorter outside off and it's chopped straight to cover point
flighted on off now and AB nicely turns it to midwicket for one
back of length outside off, AB tries to cut and misses. The ball keeps low too
136.7kph, short of length and closer to the off stump, AB defends it late on the off side
much fuller now and AB drives it easily to deep cover for one
141.7kph, bangs in the bouncer just over Behardien and it survives the wide call
swinging in now towards leg stump and it's driven straight to midwicket
bouncer to end the over too, as Behardien pulls and misses

almost caught, almost run out! AB went back in the crease for the ball that was way outside off, it turned away too and he pulled to leg. The ball fell short of mid on and FB wanted a single but was sent back and Mishra could not collect it properly. The throw from Bhuvi was wayward actually
waits for the googly and defends it back
comes down and drives the ball to mid on for one
towards the off stump from length and he defends it back
the slog-sweep goes high and Bhuvneshwar doesn't get to the ball in time running backwards from mid on, even though it was in the air for a while
pitched up and FB drives it with the turn into the covers
short of length outside off, FB taps the ball towards backward point and Jinxy the Cat was there but they take the risk and the throw goes over the stumps
outside off again and he runs it down to third man for one
swinging in towards middle and leg, it's helped to midwicket now
bouncer outside off and he pulls it to midwicket after a bounce
swinging in again, he stays back and defends towards midwicket for a quick single
pretty straight on the off stump and AB defends it back off the back foot
flighted outside off, FB drives but doesn't middle it

loud, loud appeal but S Ravi says not out! Touch flatter outside off as FB goes back to cut, Dhoni takes the catch and celebrates but the umpire thinks there was no edge. Replays show there was a sound
goes back, the ball turns away sharply and lobs the ball in the air but it falls short of cover point

another appeal - this time for lbw and the finger goes up, this time FB doesn't look happy! FB went for the sweep for the straighter ball that pitched on off, missed the ball and was hit in front of off stump
turn this time from the off stump, the batsman presses forward and is beaten as the ball goes away
starts with the short ball and AB pulls it with some power to beat deep square leg and gets four!
bouncer outside the off stump and AB lets it go
width on offer outside off and AB slams it over the in field with a big swing, he's not in any trouble against the pacers and Bhuvi is having a bad day today. That brings up AB's fifty too
charges down for the ball on middle stump, AB swings again and gets an inside edge past the stumps to the leg side for four more!
just back of length and it's tucked to leg for one
doesn't move his feet much and pushes the ball to mid on
too short, AB rocks back and opens up to pull it in the wide gap between long on and deep midwicket for four more
he's turning it on! Pitched up outside off, he goes for the reverse sweep and beats short third man for his fifth four in two overs
comes down and drives the ball in the air just wide of Mishra to long off
that's a beauty from Mishra - it pitched on leg and turned past Morris' outside edge outside the off stump
beaten again! Similar delivery on leg stump and it beats Morris who tries the front foot drive again
good length ball on the off stump, AB defends it on the off side
Morris doesn't move much for the length delivery and defends it back
on good length outside the off stump and Morris pushes it down to mid off
short ball from Bhuvi outside off and he lets it go
angled into the batsman and he takes it on the pad, AB takes a step or two and then says no
goes on the attack against the short ball, gets a top edge and it falls safe close to the square leg umpire
pretty flat towards the leg side and Morris misses as he tries to sweep-pull
another flat one towards the leg side, Morris is hit on the pad now
much slower now with some flight, he sweeps to deep fine leg now

there's a big gap on the off side and AB gets into position for the reverse sweep, Harbhajan pitches it on the middle stump, AB is well outside off and he plays an unbelievable reverse-sweep like a left-hander to the cover boundary
the ball stops a bit as AB goes back and defends the ball in the air on leg, it falls just short of midwicket
fullish on the off stump and it's pushed down to long on and he keeps strike
goes for a big swing as the ball is outside off, AB manages to not lose his balance as he misses
goes for a slog sweep now and misses again
wider outside off and he drives with the turn to deep cover
Morris goes for a sweep from way outside off but misses and is struck on the pad well outside off
Morris also tries a reverse sweep, absolutely middles it and the ball flies away over the infield for a one-bounce four
fullish outside off and it's pushed down to long off for one
turning in from outside off and it's clipped to the leg side for one
shortish outside off and he cuts off the back foot for one
bit too short, Morries goes on the back foot and pulls it to deep midwicket for one
comes down the track and lofts the ball nicely in the air in the gap between long on and deep midwicket. Jinxy runs from long on and keeps it in
AB takes it on the pad as it turns in and he doesn't connect
comes down this time to whip the ball to leg but is struck on the pad just outside off as Dhoni apepals

loud appeal for lbw, he survives that and is looking down while AB wants a run, he has his arms in the air as if saying, "why aren't you running?" Morris realises that too late and takes off but there's a direct hit at the non-striker's end. And who was the fielder at point? Jinxy the Cat!
short ball from Mohit well outside off, AB throws his bat at it and gets a thick edge over backward point for two
fullish outside off and he drives it down to mid off for one
length delivery on the off stump, Phangiso pushes that down to mid on with a straight bat
bouncer towards the head, it actually hits him on the helmet as he can't get himself out of the way in time and gets a leg bye to third man
short ball to AB too, pull-swatted to deep midwicket for one
pretty flat towards the middle stump, AB goes back and whips it to deep square leg for two
comes down and goes for a big shot, doesn't connect well and manages it in no man's land again
tries the sweep from leg stump and misses to be hit on the pad outside leg
full outside off and it's pushed down to long on for one
comes down to take it on the full, lofts it straight down the ground and send the ball to the long of boundaries. Sadly, he's cramping up and not running properly
tries the sweep now with the turn and is struck on the pad outside off
pretty full outside off and it's driven into the covers for one
dances down to make it a low full toss and drives to mid off for one
googly turns in sharply, Phangiso didn't pick it and the ball goes off his body to slip
tries a sweep now and misses this too, hit near the face
goes back in the crease now to turn the ball to leg for one
vicious turn now from middle and leg to well outside off, AB gets bat at the last moment to push to off and keeps strike
bit too short and AB pulls it to deep midwicket for one
nicely flighted well outside off, driven through the covers for one
fullish on middle and leg, flicked in the air wide of midwicket for one
presses forward and blocks the delivery outside off
takes a step down and helps the ball just past midwicket for one
gives the charge on the last ball and tonks that high on the leg side with the spin, it goes very high and has enough distance to sail over deep midwicket for a big six
such sharp turn from off stump spinning away to beat the batsman
touch wider outside off and he cuts it wide of cover for one
charges down again and hammers that straight down near the sigh screen, that's six too and he reaches hundred, his 22nd!
full and driven into the covers
outside off and turning away, punches off the back foot to sweeper cover
tucks the ball to deep square leg for two quick runs
outside off, slammed over the covers and Harbhajan cuts it off deep in the covers
turning away from off, he turns it to leg but Axar gets to it quickly
reverse sweeps the ball from off to short third man for a quick single
beaten him completely! Pitched outside off, he looked to tuck it to leg and was beaten by the turn
this time he pushes the ball to mid on for one
goes on the back foot and cuts it wide of cover for one

short ball, he points his bat upwards and slaps it wide of long on, and wants two! And Dhoni, instead of collecting the ball deflects the ball off his pads to the stumps. Two geniuses at work as AB makes it
excellent running from AB as he heaves on the leg side and the ball goes to deep midwicket. AB's not cramping anymore as he makes it back again

he's got the big wicket, AB is caught behind off a short ball after a fighting and valiant century! The bouncer seamed in, AB went for the pull and got an edge for Dhoni to take it low in front of him. AB gets a standing ovation as he waves his bat around
fullish outside off and he drives through the covers
back of length outide off, he slices it to short third man for a quick one as the fielder fumbles
pretty full and he slams it back, just wide of Bhuvi's right hand and that's hit hard enough to beat long on too
tossed up on the stumps and he slogs the full delivery between long and deep midwicket for two
comes down to loft the ball with the turn over the covers and Rohit dives forward but it falls well short of him. The ball deflects off him and they take a third
presses forward slightly and defends it back
tossed up slightly, Steyn slogs and misses
much fuller now and it's pushed down to long on for one
slog-sweeps the ball against the turn from leg stump to deep square leg
137.3kph, short ball around off stump, Phangiso goes across to scoop on leg but misses
the short ball comes again and he scoops it on the other side now after making room. There's a short third man but the ball goes much finer for four
short ball number three gets him another wicket! It was directed towards his body and Phangiso made room to pull, but got an edge high on off to be caught by a running Axar at short third man
angles the short ball in, Steyn makes room and is then not in a position to pull so pulls out
this was also shortish, Steyn pulled and sent it high on the leg side to be caught by Jinxy the Cat running in from deep backward square leg. Made it look easy
short of length ball on the body, pulled to fine leg for one to keep strike
it's full and wide and Rabada smokes that after opening up through the covers! Raina at cover got a hand to it but it went for four nevertheless
slower bouncer outside off deceives Rabada as he looks to pull and misses
another slower ball outside off - 120kph - he slaps it over the mid on region for one

a lot of confusion, the ball deflects off the pads to point and he's called for one by Rabada so Tahir goes out of the crease but then Rabada changes his mind and Rahane misses a direct hit from point to concede an overthrow
another slower ball outside off, Rabada doesn't get close to the body while pulling and misses again
angles the bouncer in dangerously at 137kph and Tahir sways out of the line just in time
short again, and that's too short this time and is called a wide
good length ball on the stumps and he defends on the leg side
this bouncer doesn't go over his head as Tahir leaves the ball outside off
slow and full this time at 108kph, Tahir swings and misses
short ball again and it's swatted to deep square leg for two
134kph, bouncer again and Tahir swings and misses
short ball angled in and he manages to get some bat while pulling it
slower ball at 105.8kph around middle and leg, Tahir waits and waits and then helps it to leg awkwardly for one
slow and wide outside off, Rabada pulls to leg and misses
tries a yorker and it's a low full toss on off stump, Rabada guides it to point for one
that was another run out chance missed, by Axar, as Tahir worked the ball to midwicket and Rabada wa sway out the crease but Axar missed at the bowler's end
the last ball is lofted over the covers by Tahir and sweeper cover cuts it in
